name: UIListSeparatorConfiguration
desc: A configuration that controls the list separator appearance in a list section.

items.name: init(listAppearance: UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.Appearance)
items.desc: Creates a list separator configuration with default values according to the specified list appearance.

items.name: var topSeparatorVisibility: UIListSeparatorConfiguration.Visibility
items.desc: The visibility of the top separator for the item the configuration applies to.

items.name: var bottomSeparatorVisibility: UIListSeparatorConfiguration.Visibility
items.desc: The visibility of the bottom separator for the item the configuration applies to.

items.name: enum UIListSeparatorConfiguration.Visibility
items.desc: An enumeration that defines the visibility of list separators.

items.name: var topSeparatorInsets: NSDirectionalEdgeInsets
items.desc: Insets to apply to the top separator of the item the configuration applies to.

items.name: var bottomSeparatorInsets: NSDirectionalEdgeInsets
items.desc: Insets to apply to the bottom separator of the item the configuration applies to.

items.name: static let automaticInsets: NSDirectionalEdgeInsets
items.desc: A constant that specifies a placeholder size for separator insets.

items.name: var color: UIColor
items.desc: The color to use for the separators of the item the configuration applies to.

items.name: var multipleSelectionColor: UIColor
items.desc: The color to use for the separators of the item the configuration applies to when the item is in a multiple-selection group.

items.name: static func == (UIListSeparatorConfiguration, UIListSeparatorConfiguration) -> Bool
items.desc: An operator for checking whether two list separator configurations are equal.

items.name: static func != (UIListSeparatorConfiguration, UIListSeparatorConfiguration) -> Bool
items.desc: An operator for checking whether two list separator configurations are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the list separator configuration by feeding them into the hasher.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A textual representation of this instance.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A textual representation of this instance, suitable for debugging.

items.name: var customMirror: Mirror
items.desc: The custom mirror for this instance.
